name: Tigerpede
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 13

traits.name: Aggressive Charge
traits.desc: On its first turn in combat, before moving or taking any actions, the tigerpede can spend its entire movement to move up to twice its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.

traits.name: Keen Sight and Smell
traits.desc: The tigerpede has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
traits.desc: The tigerpede has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

traits.name: Tackle
traits.desc: If the tigerpede tiger moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) slashing damage. If the target is prone, the tigerpede can make a bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tigerpede makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
